summary: This document is an email chain from September 18, 2019, discussing an upcoming media interview. The content references a woman who claims to have been interviewed by the FBI in 2011 and SDNY, where she named girls she helped traffic for Jeffrey Epstein and alleged he had surveillance cameras in his properties.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referenced as the individual who allegedly trafficked women to other men and installed surveillance cameras in his properties.

events.title: FBI Interview of a Witness
events.description: A woman was interviewed by the FBI, during which she reportedly gave the names of all the girls she helped to traffic.

events.title: Planned 'Dateline' Interview Airing
events.description: An interview containing allegations about Epstein's trafficking and surveillance was planned to air on NBC's 'Today' and 'Dateline'.

keyFacts: A witness claimed in a 2011 FBI interview to have named all the girls she helped traffic for Jeffrey Epstein.
Two other women reportedly told the DOJ that Epstein specifically trafficked them to 'other men'.
There were alleged surveillance cameras in Epstein's NYC house and other properties, allowing him to watch people in bathrooms and elsewhere.
These allegations were the subject of a media interview scheduled to air on NBC in September 2019.
The document is an internal email chain discussing sensitive allegations ahead of public broadcast.
